medium: Osage orange wood, porcupine quills, bone
title: Future Species
marks: Signature on PL side, below base of spine, incised: [MH]
description: teardrop-shaped fish body with very long tail; row of porcupine quills along top of spine; wide, open mouth with lips; downward-extending fins (?) at front, made of bone; light-colored wood
